LanguageData.ZP_Rawtofu.label: Raw Tofu
LanguageData.ZP_Rawtofu.description: A protein-rich substance created by processing soybeans. It can be used as a substitute for meat.\nYou can eat it raw or use it in a recipe.
LanguageData.ZP_ChoppedMeat.label: ぶつ切り肉
LanguageData.ZP_ChoppedMeat.description: 様々な種類の肉を食べやすい大きさに切った肉。
LanguageData.ZP_SeasonedMeat.label: Seasoned meat
LanguageData.ZP_SeasonedMeat.description: Heavily seasoned meat that has lost its natural "aroma." You can eat it raw or use it in a recipe.
LanguageData.ZP_FishFillet.label: Fish fillet
LanguageData.ZP_FishFillet.description: A fish that was prepared for easy cooking.\nYou can eat it raw or use it in a recipe.
LanguageData.ZP_Tikuwa.label: Chikuwa
LanguageData.ZP_Tikuwa.description: A jelly-like product created by shredding and mashing fish and taro together.\nYou can eat it raw or use it in a recipe.
LanguageData.ZP_DriedFish.label: Dried fish
LanguageData.ZP_DriedFish.description: This fish was dried out in order to keep it from decaying.\nYou can eat it raw or use it in a recipe.
